name: Unik ‚Äì Ultimate Pricing Table
author: Jewel Theme

sections.description:
No need extra configurations for Unik ‚Äì Ultimate Pricing Table. Unik ‚Äì Ultimate Pricing Table allows to create Unlimited Pricing Table. Unik Pricing Plugin installation’s a Custom Post Type named “Unik Pricing” will be created automatically. To show a set of Pricing Table a shortcode [unik_pricing] needed. The shortcode will be like [unik_pricing id=”41″], where 41 is an example of Pricing Table ID. Create a page for your Pricing Table and place the Shortcode, you are done !!!

Features Included

  • Unik – Ultimate Pricing Table Plugin includes- Pricing Title, Sub Title, Features, Currency, Color Picker, Duration.
  • No Post Feature Limits.
  • Responsive Design
  • Many more settings are comming!!!

Installation Video Tutorial:

Support

Support Forum
Pre-Sale Questions

‚úãWant More –

If you like our unik-ultimate-pricing-table plugin then why not check some other plugins that developed by us:

üöÄ WP Adminify: – The best WordPress Dashboard Customization plugin available in the market. With this plugin you will get 18+ modules like Dark Mode, Menu Editor, Folders, Dashboard Widget Manager, Login Customizer, Admin Columns, Activity Logs and many more.

üöÄ Master Blocks: – “Master Blocks” is a powerful WordPress plugin designed to enhance the functionality of the Gutenberg block editor. With this plugin, users can unlock a wide range of new blocks, offering greater flexibility and creativity when designing and customising their website’s content.

üöÄ Master Addons: – One of the best Elementor Addon plugin that packed with 70+ elements and extensions. You will get all essential elements to design any type Website.

üö¥üèª‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Image Comparison for Elementor: – This plugin dedicatedly made for image comparison element. You will get a multiple variation for image comparison. Showcase your before after work easily with the help of this plugin.

üç° Master Accordion: – If you are a default WordPress user and need a proper accordion plugin then Master Accordion is for you. You can add as much accordion as you need in multiple way.

üèï WordPress prettyPhoto: – This plugin helps you to enable lightbox for your any media file, flash, YouTube, iframes and ajax. Just enable PreetyPhoto in your desired media file and you are done.
sections.installation:
• From WordPress Dashboard go to “Plugins>> Add New>> Uploads”, select ‘unik-ultimate-pricing-table.zip’ file and upload it. Or,
  • Extract the zip file, copy and paste to the ‘wp-conten/plugins/’ directory of your WordPress Installation.
  • Activate the plugin.
  • Create a new page named it “Pricing” or anything you want. In the Editor place this shortcode [unik_pricing id=”41″], here 41 is the example of Pricing ID.
  • To show a Pricing Table a shortcode [unik_pricing] needed, just crate a page for your “Unik Pricing” section and update the page.

Installation Video Tutorial:

Liked unik-ultimate-pricing-table Plugins?

Rate us on WordPress Forum üôÇ
sections.faq:
Features and Supports

Does Unik Pricing Table has Dedicated Supports?

Yes it does. Though it’s a free Plugin but we’re giving Dedicated Supports for all of our Plugins.

Does Unik Pricing Table supports shortcodes?
Yes, you need a shortcodes [unik_pricing id=””] to use Unik Pricing Table Plugin.

** Does Unik Pricing Table allow Multiple Pricing Tables ? **
Yes, you’re free to add multiple Pricing Table as per your needs. Feel free to ask our [Support Forums] (http://jeweltheme.com/contact/)
